Settings.encparamBox: -f mp4 -c:v libx264 -profile:v main -level auto -preset veryfast -tune:v none -crf 23.0 -r 29.97 -c:a libfdk_aac -ac 2 -b:a 32k -sn -map_metadata -1 -map_chapters -1 -fdkprofile he
